strings.s: <size=30>CHAPTER IV</size>\n\nDEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF USWANA
Phew... Thank God it landed... I was starting to get really worried about the safety of this airplane...
I knew this wouldn't be a first class travel, but this is much worst than I imagined...
do you copy?
Why are you calling me? I'm still in the plane and I don't know if I'm allowed to use the radio here...
What the heck are you doing? You spent months preparing for your first travel and now you get on a plane the day after we decide the next destination?
Well... I figured that even with all that preparation I ended up in the middle of a jungle without my notes, money and ammunition...
So... I decided to improvise this time for a change...
Jesus Christ, You're in a place much more dangerous than that village... There's a group of rogue para-military thugs taking care of the security of this country, and they make their own laws...
Please... Don't make me feel more nervous than I already are, I had to fill dozens of immigration forms before landing, half of them written in a language that I'm not familiar with...

And... Anyways... I wasn't allowed to bring my guns on the plane, but at least this time I was able to bring a good amount of our own money and I'm sure it will help a lot here. Trying to deal with local currency didn't work last time...
What!?! Don't you know they strictly forbid the entrance of 'imperialist' currency in the country!?!? One of the forms you signed was probably a statement that you were not carrying foreign money!!
Oh... That... might become... a problem...
You wont last long making such stupid decisions...
You wont last long in this business making such stupid decisions,
I... I'm sorry... I shouldn't...
Now just shut up and listen...
If you're trying to make me worry, then you're really succeeding...
If you're worried it only means you care about me...
Sigh... Listen to me...
Here we go again...
The mercenaries are probably in charge of the airport security. They might suspect a 'tourist' like you willingly entering the country and will check what you're bringing in...
Oh no...
Yeah... But remember that these are highly corruptible people... There might be ways of getting out of the trouble and even keep some of the money...
"Ways"...
Yeah... Just keep your cool... And try to find some leads about where they might be keeping your artifact...
Okay...
And one last thing...
HAD INTIMACY WITH HER
DID NOT HAD INTIMACY WITH HER
I know you're still wet thinking about our 'exercise' last night...
I know you left so abruptly only because you wouldn't resist the temptation of repeating our 'exercise' last night... And I know you're still getting wet thinking about it...
Yeah... For now, let's focus on the mission...
Please, don't be so reckless and get back in one piece...
Please, don't be so reckless and get back in one piece...
Thank you for taking care of me,
Actually... Nevermind...
Now just try to act naturally until you're out of the airport...
What about the money... It's right here inside my backpack...
Keep it in the backpack
Keep it in the backpack... Try to hide it under all your stuff there... At least it will be a little harder to find...
Hide it in your shorts
Hide it in your shorts... The plane crew will report if you left it in the plane and their customs might search the backpack...
Okay... You're right...
Now get out of there...
Hum... This place doesn't look so bad...
But... It's weird how there aren't a single soul around here...
Don't be fooled by a fancy facade, You can't see anyone in the arrival gate because most people are interested in getting out this country...
...while you are one of the very few trying to get in...
Oh... I never thought about that...
I wonder if I can just...
Hey!! You there!!
Tourists must pass a security check before entering the country...
Come this way...
_Oh no... Oh no... Oh no..._
Calm down... The more suspicious he is of you the bigger is the trouble you get into...
I'll try to help you during the secutiy check...
Come in, girl... Take off your boots so I can check them first...
Boots are clean... Now stand right there for the security check...
I'll ask you some questions now... And I must warn you that lying to an immigration officer is a serious crime...
But I didn't do anything wrong...
But I... I didn't do anything wrong... I swear...
Hey... You only talk when I allow... We didn't even started and you say a classic guilty line...
Oh...
Oh... Okay, sir...
Oh... Okay, sir...
Good... Cooperate with this procedure and you may leave very soon...
Thank you, sir...
KEEP SILENT
You look nervous, girl... Forcing yourself to stay silent usually means fear of saying the wrong thing...
Now listen carefully and and answer the questions...
First... Tell me your name...
My name is written in the passport, sir...
What kind of question is this? My name is written in the passport, sir...
Are you stupid or something? I said you to answer the fucking questions!
Oh... I'm sorry...
This is not what it says in you passport, girl... Is it a conterfeit one? Are you dumb enough to not even memorize your fake name?
No... no... I was distracted... My name is ... ...
Such a fancy name... You probably're one of those spoiled attention whores trying to post pictures at exotic places aren't you?
No... I'm not, sir...
Yeah... Yeah... Whatever...
Now... The next question is very important...
And you'd better don't lie! I'm very good on spoting little liars...
What's the purpose of your visit?
I'm trying to locate an ancient artifact
I'm trying to locate an ancient artifact...
So... You'll try to steal one of the many historic treasures of this country... And you have the nerve to say it my face?
What!? No, sir... I... I won't steal anything... I just need to study it for...
Don't waste your breath, girl... I can sense you're up to no good here...
I'm here on holiday
I'm uhhh... I'm here on holiday...
Holiday... At the Democratic Republic of Uswana... That would be hard enough to believe even if you were not so bad at lying....
I... I'm not lying, sir... I swear... I'm... I'm just nervous...
You're making yourself very hard to believe, girl...
It's a business trip
It's a business trip...
Business... A girl like you? I see...
You're probably one of those high class escorts hired by some of our government leaders, right?
Uhh... Yes, I am...
Nice... Those guys have all the fun... Maybe you can show me a bit of your 'business' later...
What!? I'm no escort...
Humm... I believe you're saying half truths to me, girl...
Well, girl... At the end of the day, there's one thing I really must know... And you better not lie this time if you don't want to get into a world of trouble...
Are you bringing any illegal items into this country?
I brought this money...
I... I'm sorry, but I... I brought this money from my country...
So... You are really one of the stupid ones, aren't you?
Huh?
You travelled all the way here just to confess that you're carring a currency that's explicity not allowed in the hands of civillians...
I... I didn't know it was illegal... I just don't want to get into trouble...
Of course you didn't know... As I said: stupid... And confessing won't save you from any trouble...
I'm sorry, sir... I'm so sorry...
Give me the fucking money...
Don't be stupid... Just say 'no'...
No...
I... No... I... definetively not brought anything illegal...
Yeah... That's what they all say...
I... I'm telling the truth, sir...
What exactly is illegal?
What exactly is illegal to bring, sir?
So... Are you really going to play dumb with me? If you don't know what is not allowed here, chances are that you actually brought something illegal...
No... I mean... I don't have anything illegal... I was just wondering why things like money can't be brough here and...
Sigh... Mommy and daddy shouldn't allow you to travel alone, silly girl...
Well... You're not sounding very convincing, girl...
I'm telling the truth, sir... I don't have nothing illegal with me...
The very few people who still try to get into the country these days usually try to smuggle something concealed in their clothes or their luggage...
So you won't mind if I perform a quick search into that backpack of yours, right...
_Oh no..._
Wait... Wait...
Huh?!
_Oh my God... He will find the money if I let him search my backpack... I need to distract him..._
Look here sir... I'll show you I'm telling the truth... I... I have nothing concealed into my clothes... You don't need to worry about me...
Now this is starting to get interesting...
I can see you have nothing there, but... I'll need to see more to get convinced, girl...
What... What do you mean...
I need to see more skin to... you know... make sure you don't have anything hidden elsewhere...
But...
Come on... I know you are the kind of girl who loves to show her nice body to any men using uniforms... Aren't you?
SHOW MORE
I... I'll show... Just to prove that I'm not hiding anything illegal...
Yeah... Whatever you say...
Here... You see... Nothing hidden...
Well... I can see two very nice things that were hidden... But thank God they are very legal...
So... What are you waiting for?
Huh!?
I can still see clothing where you could hide stuff... And I must be sure...
You can't be serious...
Oh... I'm dead serious... If you can't show me more I will never be sure....
Can you see, now... I have nothing hidden...
I can't believe this is a procedure accepted by authorities in this airport...
Yeah... A common procedure for little sluts like you...
Well... There's very little left now to I finally let you go...
WHAT!?
I just need know if didn't hide anything into... you know...
Into your happy place...
You... You... You can't ask for this...
I can ask for more than you think, skank...
I might even do the 'search' myself if you don't convince me...
So give a clear view of the common 'hiding places'...
Huumm...
Nice to see a girl not ashamed to show her intimacy to the first man who asks for it... I'll remember this image for 'later', you know...
You... You... You just demanded to...
Yeah... And you just accepted without questioning...
Yeah... I wonder if your boyfriend knows you drop your clothes to strangers so easily like this...
But, hey... At first sight your really don't seem to be hiding anything there...
I told you so... Now let me dress again...
I... I showed everything, sir... Please, let me go now...
NO WAY
This... This is not appropriate for you to ask... I... I can't...
So you're just a tease... I hate your kind, you know...
Well... I'm still suspicious... So... I guess I'll need to look first at that backpack of yours...
But... But...
Sure, sir... No problem...
Then let's see what we can find here...
Hey... This is not looking good, ...
Looks like he won't give up so easily... You might have a few seconds while he is distracted to try something quick!
The recycle bin... Quick! Dump the money there...
I did it, but... But I won't be able to recover it from there...
It doesn't matter... We have no idea what he could do to you if he found this money with you...
Your boots! Throw the money into the boots...
I did it!
Nice... He already checked the boots earlier... Let's hope he won't look into it again...
The fan... Hide the money under the fan!
It's... It's too dangerous... The fan is too close to him... He will notice me...
Damn, That was probably the only chance you had...
Those papers... Try to hide the money under those papers!
It's... It's too dangerous... The fan is too close to him... And money might just be blown all over hus face!...
Damn, That was probably the only chance you had...
Quick, Can't you see any place to hide the money?
I... I... I don't know what to do...
Jesus Christ... You might get into serious trouble because of this...
What the fuck is this...
Oh my God...
Hey girl... This is not technically illegal, but...
You might get into serious trouble if some people in this country find you playing with this...
This is... This is not supposed to be there... I... I forgot I was supposed to throw it away...
Yeah... But you just couldn't stay away of your best friend, right?
No, it's... I just...
Don't worry... As I said, it won't be confiscated... You'll keep your toy...
Now let's see if there are more nasty stuff hidden in this thing...
Hey... What's this...
Whoah... Jackpot...
Looks like you came here quite loaded, didn't you...
I... I'm sorry...
Sorry?
Are you sorry for bringing this money or for lying to me when I asked about illegal items?
Do you really tought I'm too supid to not find this?
Are you trying to fuck with me?
No, sir... Please...
Stupid bitch... You have no idea with who you're messing with...
Now... If you were trying to get into the country with this... Then I'll have to perform a FULL SEARCH on you...
A full... Full search?
Yes... A good old cavity search...
WHAT!?
My orders are to follow the procedure, and this part is my favorite one...
And don't you dare to complain... The procedure is the only thing saving you from me beating your face to a pulp for trying to fool me...
So... Get your hands on the wall...
NOW!!
Please, sir...
This... This procedure must be against all UN regulations...
Ha ha ha... Don't make me laugh, girl... The blue helmet pussies don't have the balls to even come close to our borders...
Now let get this started...
Nice...
I hate doing this boring desk job while the guys can shoot their guns in the open...
But there are always times like this that makes everything worth...
Now... To make sure you're not carry any other illegal shit, we'll need to lose some of these clothes...
But don't move... This is my job...
Oh, boy... Talk about a lucky day...
STAY SILENT
It's good to notice you stopped whining, girl... It seems you're either trying to act tough or just eager for the procedure...
WHIMPER
_no... not this... please..._
Goddamnit... You're going to stop whining or things will get even worse, girl... NOW, SHUT UP!!
ASK TO BE GENTLE
Please, be gentle...
Cool down, slut... Do you think I'll just start pounding you? This is not exactly what this procedure is about...
Great... This gives me a good view of your whole body...
And... Man... What a nice body...
Jesus Christ, Lara... You just arrived there and are already exposing yourself to the men around?
Well... The superficial exam didn't show nothing wrong being carried with you...
See!? Can I go now?
Ha ha ha... We still need to perform the 'in depth' exam, girl...
Yeah... Just stay right there
I hope you found a comfortable position, girl...
What... What do you mean...
Shhh.... You'll understand very soon...
Oh Lord... What... What are you doing?
As I said... I need to make a in depht search on you... And I will need a very close look here...
You see... There's a special place where girls like you often use to conceal illegal stuff...
No... Please... I don't have anything more on me... I swear...
Sorry, but your word means nothing to me...
Now... There it is...
Whoah... Seems quite tight from here... But looks can be deceiving...
What... What are you doing?!?
You can't be so stupid... You know what a cavity search means, right?
But if you don't know... You'll learn very soon...
Let me get rid of these gloves and I will show you...
No... Please... I never... never... had anything get into my... my...
Well... If you're telling the truth, then maybe this will hurt just a little at the beggining...
But I'm sure you'll get used to it really quick...
But let's stop wasting our time and get this done...
Oh my God... Please... Not there... Please...
Damn... It's tight, indeed...
But I can't stop now...
So... If you really never had anything going up here... then the time to know how it feels is now... Get ready...
Stop, please!! It hurts!! It hurts!!
Easy, now... I can feel that soon you'll be actually enjoying this...
But you probably heard I talking about an 'in depth' search, right? And we are still not deep enough...
No... Please... No...
Here we goooo...
Shiit... It's nice, warm and goddamn tight here, girl...
I'm starting to believe you when you said nothing ever went in the 'upwards' direction here...
Your boyfriend really never tapped this ass? I'm glad to be the first one to show you how it feels then...
MMmmmnngh... MMmmmnngh...
What? Can't speak intelligible words, now? Is it because it hurts or are just starting to feel good?
MMmmmnngh... MMmmmnngh...
Yeah... I think I know the answer...
This is what I'm talking about, girl...
Can you feel? Those are your juices flowing... You know what it means?
It... It means nothing...
Yeah... Keep fooling yourself...
Now... Back to work...
But don't worry... A little bit more of practice and you'll soon be really enjoying this...
I'm almost convinced you're clean, girl...
Let's just make sure nothing will appear if we try this a little harder...
Yeah... Now let me show you something amazing...
There... You see?
See what? Please... Stop this non-sense already...
Right there... Your tiny asshole... Not so tiny now...
See how it still twinkles... It's your sphincter, girl... Creating the muscle memory you need to soon be craving for having all kinds of stuff sticked up your butthole...
Oh my God... You are trully a sick man...
Please... You already checked me... I'm not carrying anything more... Stop with this...
Wait right there...
I notice this thing in your backpack that is perfect for this situation...
WHAT!? You... You can't be serious...
Yes, I am... The procedure allows me to use on the search only my finger... or other addtional 'appropriate' tools...
If this is not appropriate, I don't know what more could be... And I won't let pass the opportunity to finally cover all possible ground of the rules...
Here... Why would you want to carry around this little buddy of yours if you never use it correctly...
Oh my God... You're insane... Please... Let me go...
Stop whining... You'll be thanking me soon...
It won't fit... It won't fit...
Of course it will... It's just a little bigger than my finger...
You should be thankfull I'm not allowed to use my johnson on you while I'm on duty... That would be difficult to fit...
Now get your sphincter ready... It's time to go all in...
Nice... You took it all like a pro...
Oooouch... This thing is... Is filling me...
Yeah... Soon you'll be thinking about having this void filled with real cock...
So... I'll start the training for your future...
Yeeeah... Do you like it, girl? Taking some pumping into your ass?
MMmmmnngh... MMmmmnngh...
Hey... Quit your moaning and answer me properly... Do you like it?
I... I... I do, sir... It's... It's good... Stick it right up my ass...
Ha... I knew there was anal slut inside you waiting to be freed...
What... Noo... I... I don't even know what I'm saying...
It's because you can't think straight when you're about to cum while having a dildo up your ass... I can feel your pussy twitching every time my fingers get close enough to touch it...
Nooo... It huurts...
Humpf... Looks you still need a little more training, then...
Just stop it, please...
Now... Let's end this with a good final act, right?
Come on, girl... Let yourself go... I know you can do it...
Damn... Such a dirty girl...
I'm sorry, ... I'm so sorry... I didn't want to feel like this...
Don't worry... It's not like your boyfriend could hear you moaning with my moves, right?
What... What is happening to me... How could I...
Ha... It's just your true nature... You're just discovering more about yourself...
Okay... I think you had enough...
Well... Can you feel the wind blowing inside you, girl? You better get used to this feeling...
Please... Just let me go...
Okay... If you had something hidden in there, I would definetively be able to see now... You can get dressed again...
Well... Your backpack seems okay...
Now if you show me you have nothing hidden around your waist then I might let you go...
What?!
No reason to get so shy, now... Just raise your shirt a little bit so I can check you have nothing hidden into these tight shorts of yours...
Whoah... If you didn't get rid of the money then things would get ugly now...
If he's not supicious after this, maybe he will let you go...
Here... You see? I... I have nothing on me...
Oh... You have a lot... But I don't think these nice abs count as an illegal item...
Looks like you're clean there too...
_Oh no... Oh no... Oh no..._
Come on... I don't have time to waste...
Do it... NOW!
I don't know... You did not convinced me of your innocence...
And in this case I'm authorized to perform a cavity search...
A WHAT?!?
Yeah... It's the only way to make sure you're not smuggling anything...
But... but...
You should have read this is a standard procedure at this airport... You even signed a form stating you would agree to do it at the plane...
I... I couldn't even read what was written in those forms...
It's too late to regret now... You did not pass the check, and since we don't have any female officers around, I'll have to perform the search myself...
But... but...
Just stop whining and let's get it started... Turn your face to the wall! NOW!
This... This can't be happening...
Yes, it can... It's the best part of this job... Just keep quiet there while I work...
Well... You convinced me... I don't think I'll find anything wrong with you...
So... Welcome to the Democratic Repulic of Uswana...
Uhh... Thank you, sir... I guess...
Now gather your stuff and get the hell out of my office...
Okay... Consider yourself very lucky, girl... The amount of money I found on you is just bellow the minimum required to grant you a few mounths months in the pits of our prison system...
It will be confiscated and you now have a criminal record... So... You'd better behave... or else you'll have to learn to call this country as 'home'...
I... I'll behave...
Good... Now gather your stuff and get out of my sight...
You'd better get out of there before he changes his mind,
But... My money... It would be so helpful if I could keep some of it...
What the hell are you talking about? Get out of there already...
I wonder if...
